alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 6:57AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water Along Norton Sound and Yukon Delta Coast This Afternoon Into Wednesday... Westerly gale force winds this afternoon and tonight over Norton Sound and the Yukon Delta will bring elevated water levels to those areas this afternoon through Wednesday. Expect sea water to rise 3-4 feet above normal high tides. At this time do not expect flooding due to the short duration of the winds and to the extensive sea ice, but this will likely push water on top of sea ice along the coast, and could push water on top of the Yukon River ice 30 miles inland

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
